body:
# Optimize CI/CD Pipeline <!-- id: 2026-02-07-optimize-ci-cd-pipeline -->

## Context & Goal
Speed up the feedback loop for AI agents and humans.

## Plan
- [ ] Implement caching for npm and Playwright.
- [ ] Add automatic artifact upload for failed runs.
- [ ] Integrate the session cost report into the CI summary.

## Artifacts
- `.github/workflows/`
title: Optimize CI/CD Pipeline
